name: Remove interaction restrictions for a repository

previews.name: sombra
previews.description:
**Note:** The Interactions API is currently in public preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2018-12-18-interactions-preview) preview for more details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.sombra-preview

```

description: Removes all interaction restrictions from the given repository. You must have owner or admin access to remove restrictions.
